title: Pattern Pricking, ""La boule de Neige"  [The Snowball]", early 20th century
inscribed: modele No. 261 de "La Boule de Neige" Le Mans - fil No 400 - 80 fuseaux
dimensions: Length: 40.5 cm [16"] Direction in which the pattern was worked. Width: 9 cm [3.5"] Lace sample Length: 8.5 cm [3.25"] Direction worked. Width: 6.5 cm [2.5"]
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Pattern pricking with design drawn on green paper. Small sample of bobbin lace made from the pattern and sewn to the pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pattern Pricking, ""La boule de Neige"  [The Snowball]", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cardboard, paper. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz. 1983-14-11.
